c_relatedProducts.richTextDescription:
#### PRODUCT DETAILS

Display: Analogue  
Movement: Automatic  
Power source: Motion  
Dial style: Patterned round stainless steel dial  
Features: Reset Time, Chronograph, Date Aperture  
Strap style: Black cut work, leather strap with a tang closure  
Water resistance: 100 m  
Warranty: 2 years  
Warranty provided by brand/manufacturer  
Comes in a signature TISSOT case


#### Size \& Fit

Dial width:  
Strap Width


#### Material \& Care

Wipe with a clean, dry cloth when needed
